User-agent: *
Disallow: /private/
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /cgi-bin/
Disallow: /tmp/
Allow: /

User-agent: Googlebot
Disallow: /private/
Disallow: /admin/
Allow: /

User-agent: Feedsearch-Crawler
Allow: /
Crawl-delay: 1

User-agent: BadBot
Disallow: /

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://example.com/sitemap.xml
Sitemap: https://example.com/sitemap-news.xml

# Comments - this is a test robots.txt for feedsearch-crawler testing
